2017900.name: Rock Hoppers
2017900.description:
Whether you're alone or with friends, Rock Hoppers offers a unique new survival challenge. Explore and conquer your way through a procedurally generated asteroid belt full of dangers and wonders!

You start with nothing but an oxygen tank and a beat up old vacsuit to your name. Earn that next meal and that next breath of air by working for the local factions or strike out on your own in search of fortune. Your goal is not just to survive, but to thrive, and just maybe, to save the belt.

EXPLORE THE ASTEROID BELT


Explore a hostile alien environment where man is not an intruder, but merely a nuisance. Encounter a wide variety of aliens both weird and terrible. Build a vessel and set out in to the void in search of new biomes and new challenges.

BUILD A BASE TO PROTECT WHAT'S YOURS


You can start out small or aim big, but you'll need to defend you and yours from the constant threats the belt will throw at you. Experiment with new building styles in a world where up and down are only as good as the nearest gravmat. Build defenses both automated and manned, and progress through the tech tree to constantly improve your build. Hire guards, miners, and engineers to man your base and keep it humming.

GATHER, LEARN, AND CRAFT


Travel the length and breadth of the belt collecting resources for armor, weapons, vehicles, and more. Harvest alien plants. Spin the flesh of your enemies into filament for your fabricators, and complete special missions for unique and powerful rewards.

KEY FEATURES

  • Procedurally-generated worlds with distinct biomes, enemies, and challenges. No two games are the same.
  • Play alone or with friends. Extensive customization options let you run your own dedicated server exactly how you like it.
  • Customizable weapons and armor allow you to create the right build for you and for the enemies you'll face. Craft and find clothes and armor, melee and ranged weapons. Equip your friends and your colonists with the gear they need to survive.
  • Build or destroy the entire world. Every block, every wall, every piece of ice or stone is destructible. Hollow out an asteroid or convert a broom closet. Manage power and oxygen for yourself and your people.
  • Build and fly vehicles with the help of friends or hirelings. Fly in groups or pack into a single ship. Find vehicle upgrades that will let you make your vessels truly your own.
